mapper.select: SELECT address_id AS addressId, address_zipcode AS addressZipcode, address_road AS addressRoad, address_content AS addressContent, address_category AS addressCategory, address_detail AS addressDetail, member_id AS memberId FROM address WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY address_id
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(address_id), 0) + 1 AS addressId FROM address
INSERT INTO address ( address_id, address_zipcode, address_road, address_content, address_category, address_detail, member_id ) VALUES( #{addressId}, #{addressZipcode}, #{addressRoad}, #{addressContent}, #{addressCategory}, #{addressDetail}, #{memberId} )
